MazeObjects

Class CustomMazeObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • MazeObjects.MazeObject
      • MazeObjects.CustomMazeObject

  • public class CustomMazeObject
extends MazeObject
    the class customMazeObject is used to place custom objects in the maze that are imported from a .obj file

    Like all MazeObjects, it implements a translate method that returns a copy of the maze object moved to a different location, and a very weak equals method that acts as a somewhat more specific version of the instanceof operator.
